text: Carlo Marino (born 19 October 1968 in Caserta) is an Italian politician. Former member of the centre-right party Forza Italia, he joined the Democratic Party in 2007. He was elected Mayor of Caserta on 19 June 2016 and took his office on 21 June. ==References== ==See also== *2016 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Caserta ==External links== * * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Caserta Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Carlo Marino
